sn28.3:1.2: Venerable Ānanda saw Venerable Sāriputta and said to him:
sn28.3:1.3: “Reverend Sāriputta, your faculties are so very clear, and your complexion is pure and bright.
sn28.3:1.4: What meditation were you practicing today?”
sn28.3:2.1: “Reverend, with the fading away of rapture, I entered and remained in the third absorption, where I meditated with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, ‘Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.’
sn28.3:2.2: But it didn’t occur to me:
sn28.3:2.3: ‘I am entering the third absorption’ or ‘I have entered the third absorption’ or ‘I am emerging from the third absorption’.”
sn28.3:2.4: “That must be because Venerable Sāriputta has long ago totally eradicated ego, possessiveness, and the underlying tendency to conceit.
sn28.3:2.5: That’s why it didn’t occur to you:
sn28.3:2.6: ‘I am entering the third absorption’ or ‘I have entered the third absorption’ or ‘I am emerging from the third absorption’.”
